description: Configuration of the scaling behavior of the target in both up and down directions.

scaleDown.description: The scaling policy for scaling Down. If not set, the default value is to allow to scale down to `minReplicas` Pods, with a 300 second stabilization window.

scaleUp.description: The scaling policy for scaling Up. If not set, the default value is the higher of: 1) increase no more than 4 Pods per 60 seconds; 2) double the number of Pods per 60 seconds. No stabilization is used.
